text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock We shouldn’t be playing the blame game which a lot of journalists and TV presenters are playing ,some are almost rejoicing in any failures so they can make issue out of it. We all should be supporting the guys who are working day and night against the odds at times.
